data.title: 4-star forward Mason Miller, son of Mike Miller, commits to Creighton over Indiana
data.meta_description: Creighton got big news Monday as they are on pace to have maybe the best recruiting class in school...
data.text:
Creighton got big news Monday as they are on pace to have maybe the best recruiting class in school history. Creighton landed the commitment of 4-star forward Mason Miller. Miller, who is the son of long time NBA player Mike Miller, checks in as the No. 65 player in the 247Sports Composite for the class of 2021, and he selected the Bluejays over Indiana. (247 Sports)
